skills.name: Dawn of the Torpedo (鱼雷破晓)
skills.text:
1. Comes with 1 [Torpedo Salvo] charge, can use [Torpedo Salvo] attacks.
2. [Torpedo Salvo] damage increased by 130%.
3. When [Torpedo Salvo] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds.
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Gneisenau's Firepower in damage.
4. Can fire [Torpedo Salvo] from Long Range.

skills.name: High-Explosive Shell (榴弹灼烧)
skills.text:
[Main Battery Salvo] damage reduced by 20%.
If [Main Battery Salvo] hits, 100% to apply 2 stacks of [Fire], dealing 110% of Firepower over 10 seconds.

skills.name: Main Battery Autoloader - Type Zero (主炮缓冲终型)
skills.text: When an enemy dies by [Fire], reduces [Main Battery Salvo] CD by 10 seconds, can only proc 2 times per battle.
